subject: Sexual Health
title: Reproductive Cancers
description: A short lesson to help you apply Reproductive Cancers.

hook.text: Cancers of the reproductive system affect both sexes, yet early detection saves countless lives.

buildup.text: In women, cervical, ovarian, and uterine cancers are the most common reproductive malignancies.

discovery.text: In men, prostate and testicular cancers are the primary threats. Prostate cancer is the most common.

twist.text: The HPV vaccine prevents most cervical cancers. A deadly cancer stopped by a simple shot.

climax.text: Regular screenings like Pap smears and PSA tests catch cancers early when they are most treatable.

punchline.text: Screening and vaccines save lives. Prevention wins.

quiz.question: What does the HPV vaccine help prevent?
